vijayawada.discription: The ruins of Kondapalli Fort, also known as Kondapalli Kota, offer a throwback into the medieval glory of Vijayawada. Tucked away in a hilly area, the fort is a serene spot where one can spend hours exploring its ramparts.
vijayawada.name: Kondapalli Fort

vijayawada.discription: Vijayawada is considered to be a sacred place for residing one of the most visited and famous temples of Andhra Pradesh and India, Kanaka Durga Temple of Hindu Goddess Durga. It also serves as the ritual host of Pushkaram (a river worshipping ritual in India) of River Krishna.
vijayawada.name: Vijayawada
